title: Incorrect decimals values for Populous, Veros, Cofoundit and Ripio Credit Network tokens
body: ### Description [comment]: # (Feature or Bug? i.e Type: Bug) *Type*: Bug [comment]: # (Describe the feature you would like, or briefly summarise the bug and what you did, what you expected to happen, and what actually happens. Sections below) *Summary*: 28 of 88 used tokens have inconsistencies in names, symbols or decimals after comparing data from [tokens.cljs](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/blob/develop/src/status_im/utils/ethereum/tokens.cljs) with data from http://api.ethplorer.io/. ## Incorrect decimals values: - address 0xd4fa1460f537bb9085d22c7bccb5dd450ef28e3a (Populous): decimals value 18, expected 8 - address 0xedbaf3c5100302dcdda53269322f3730b1f0416d (Veros): decimals value 18, expected 5 - address 0xf970b8e36e23f7fc3fd752eea86f8be8d83375a6 (Ripio Credit Network Token): decimals value 9, expected 18 - address 0x12fef5e57bf45873cd9b62e9dbd7bfb99e32d73e (Cofoundit): decimals value 2, expected 18 ## Incorrect names and symbols: - address 0xd26114cd6EE289AccF82350c8d8487fedB8A0C07: token name 'OmiseGo', expected 'OMGToken' - address 0xd4fa1460f537bb9085d22c7bccb5dd450ef28e3a: token name 'Populous', expected 'Populous Platform' - address 0xe94327d07fc17907b4db788e5adf2ed424addff6: token name 'Augur', expected 'Reputation' - address 0xB97048628DB6B661D4C2aA833e95Dbe1A905B280: token name 'TenXPay', expected 'TenX Pay Token' - address 0xedbaf3c5100302dcdda53269322f3730b1f0416d: symbol 'VERI', expected 'VRS', token name 'Veros', expected 'VEROS' - address 0xe0b7927c4af23765cb51314a0e0521a9645f0e2a: token name 'DGD', expected 'Digix DAO' - address 0x5af2be193a6abca9c8817001f45744777db30756: symbol 'ETHOS', expected 'BQX', token name 'Ethos', expected 'Bitquence' - address 0x744d70fdbe2ba4cf95131626614a1763df805b9e: token name 'Status Network Token', expected 'Status Network' - address 0x9B11EFcAAA1890f6eE52C6bB7CF8153aC5d74139: symbol 'ATMChain', expected 'ATM' - address 0xEF68e7C694F40c8202821eDF525dE3782458639f: token name 'LoopringCoin', expected 'loopring' - address 0x7A41e0517a5ecA4FdbC7FbebA4D4c47B9fF6DC63: token name 'Zeus Shield Token', expected 'Zeus Shield Coin' - address 0x0cf0ee63788a0849fe5297f3407f701e122cc023: token name 'Streamr DATAcoin', expected 'DATAcoin' - address 0x96A65609a7B84E8842732DEB08f56C3E21aC6f8a: symbol 'Centra', expected 'CTR', token name 'Centra Token', expected 'Centra' - address 0x12b19d3e2ccc14da04fae33e63652ce469b3f2fd: token name 'GRID+ Token', expected 'GRID Token' - address 0x0f5d2fb29fb7d3cfee444a200298f468908cc942: token name 'Decentraland MANA', expected 'Decentraland' - address 0x48f775efbe4f5ece6e0df2f7b5932df56823b990: token name 'R Token', expected 'R token' - address 0xaf30d2a7e90d7dc361c8c4585e9bb7d2f6f15bc7: token name 'FirstBlood Token', expected 'Firstblood' - address 0x08d32b0da63e2C3bcF8019c9c5d849d7a9d791e6: symbol 'DCN', expected 'Ù¨' - address 0x29d75277ac7f0335b2165d0895e8725cbf658d73: token name 'BitDice', expected 'BitDice CSNO' - address 0x0d88ed6e74bbfd96b831231638b66c05571e824f: token name 'AVT', expected 'AVENTUS' - address 0x6531f133e6deebe7f2dce5a0441aa7ef330b4e53: token name 'TIME', expected 'Chronobank TIME' - address 0x006BeA43Baa3f7A6f765F14f10A1a1b08334EF45: token name 'STOX', expected 'Stox' - address 0x2c974b2d0ba1716e644c1fc59982a89ddd2ff724: token name 'Vibe', expected 'VIB' - address 0x7728dFEF5aBd468669EB7f9b48A7f70a501eD29D: token name 'PRG', expected 'ParagonCoin' - address 0x6c2adc2073994fb2ccc5032cc2906fa221e9b391: token name 'Delphy', expected 'Delphy Token' - address 0x9af4f26941677c706cfecf6d3379ff01bb85d5ab: token name 'DomRaider Token', expected 'Domraider' - address 0x2e071D2966Aa7D8dECB1005885bA1977D6038A65: token name 'Dice', expected 'DICE' ### Reproduction [comment]: # (Describe how we can replicate the bug step by step.) - Check token info by address in http://api.ethplorer.io i.e `http://api.ethplorer.io/getTokenInfo/0x2c974b2d0ba1716e644c1fc59982a89ddd2ff724?apiKey=freekey` ### Additional Information [comment]: # (Please do your best to fill this out.) * Status version: develop
